entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0149.10075] A value of 4,073,000 has been reported for the concept NoncurrentAssets. This element is used to represent the value of Long Lived Assets by Geographic region. This element must be included as a presentation descendant of the table ScheduleOfRevenuesFromExternalCustomersAndLongLivedAssetsTable. The element appears as a descendant of the table us-gaap:StatementTable. Update the table to ScheduleOfRevenuesFromExternalCustomersAndLongLivedAssetsTable.
Concept : us-gaap:NoncurrentAssets Value : 4,073,000 Total period : 2024-09-30 Dimensions : srt:StatementGeographicalAxis=srt:AmericasMember Decimals : -3
